title: COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 1082/93 of 3 May 1993 amending Regulations (EEC) No 3477/92 and (EEC) No 3478/92 with regard to the fixing of certain time limits in respect of raw tobacco
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 1082/93 of 3 May 1993 amending Regulations (EEC) No 3477/92 and (EEC) No 3478/92 with regard to the fixing of certain time limits in respect of raw tobacco
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Regulation (EEC) No 3477/92 is hereby amended as follows:
The following text is added to the end of Article 11 (3):
'However, for the 1993 harvest, Greece and Italy are hereby authorized to extend the 1 May time limit to 1 June.'

Regulation (EEC) No 3478/92 is hereby amended as follows:
1. the following text is added to the end of Article 3 (1):
'For the 1993 harvest, Greece and Italy are hereby authorized to extend the 14 April and 10 May time limits to 14 May and 10 June respectively.',
2. the following text is added to the end of Article 3 (2):
'However, for the 1993 harvest, Greece and Italy are hereby authorized to extend the 1 and 20 May time limits to 1 and 20 June respectively.',
3. the following text is added to the end of Article 5a (1):
'However, Greece and Italy are hereby authorized to extend the 14 April time limit to 14 May.',
4. the following text is added to the end of Article 5a (4):
'However, Greece and Italy are hereby authorized to extend the 1 May time limit to 1 June.'

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day of its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply from 14 April 1993.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
